specific_question: What proportion of our software quality assurance testing time is spent on user experience and interface issues in Q3 2025?
answer: 45% of our software quality assurance testing time will be dedicated to user experience and interface issues in Q3 2025.
justification: This answer provides a quantitative metric to address the DR Question's concern about optimizing quality assurance processes for electric vehicle production, specifically regarding software and user experience issues.
dr_question: How can Elexion Automotive’s quality assurance processes be optimized to address the unique challenges of electric vehicle production, such as software and user experience issues, compared to gasoline cars?
